text:
Come bless the Lord
All ye servants of the Lord,


Who stand by night

In the house of the Lord,

Lift up your hands in the Holy place
And bless the Lord,

and bless the Lord.

Oh taste and see that
the Lord is good (3)
And bless the Lord
and bless the Lord.

He lifted me up,

From the miry clay,

And set my feet

On the rock to stay,

He put a song in my heart today
A song of praise,

a song of praise.
